name: Eufy Security WS
description: eufy-security-ws is a small server wrapper around the eufy-security-client library to access it via a WebSocket. It allows you to control Eufy security devices by connecting to the Eufy cloud servers and local/remote stations.
longDescription: eufy-security-ws is a small server wrapper around the eufy-security-client library to access it via a WebSocket. It allows you to control Eufy security devices by connecting to the Eufy cloud servers and local/remote stations.
